title: For the matters not provided in this regulation, the relevant provisions of Principal DCPR shall apply
clause_text: For the matters not provided in this regulation, the relevant provisions of Principal DCPR shall apply. However, in case of any conflict between this Regulation and any other Regulation/s of the Principal DCPR, this Regulation shall prevail for the TOD zone.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
